sentence.Network_en: The document is expressed in terms that are readily understood and agreed.
sentence.Network_cn: 文件用语浅显易懂，让人易于接受。

sentence.Network_en: Wild boar readily hybridises with the domestic pig.
sentence.Network_cn: 野猪很容易和家猪杂交。

entry.def: If you do something readily, you do it in a way which shows that you are very willing to do it.

example.ex: I asked her if she would allow me to interview her, and she readily agreed...
example.tran: 我问她是否允许我采访她，她欣然同意了。

example.ex: When I was invited to the party, I readily accepted.
example.tran: 当被邀请参加聚会的时候，我一口答应了。

entry.def: You also use readily to say that something can be done or obtained quickly and easily. For example, if you say that something can be readily understood, you mean that people can understand it quickly and easily.

example.ex: The components are readily available in hardware shops...
example.tran: 这些零件很容易在五金商店买到。

auth_sentence.content: It's not something actually you can readily change.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's not something actually you can readily change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's not something actually you can readily change.

auth_sentence.content: The questions we're asking are really readily answerable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The questions we're asking are really readily answerable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The questions we're asking are really readily answerable.

auth_sentence.content: Barclays at risk, and Barclays had readily agreed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Barclays at risk, and Barclays had readily agreed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Barclays at risk, and Barclays had readily agreed.

Sentence.sentence: We conform ( 遵守) to norms so readily that we are hardly aware they exist.
Generous parental leave policies and readily available part-time options have unintended consequences:instead of strengthening women's attachment to the workplace,they appear to weaken it.
They readily respond to medical treatment.
Space exploration has always been the province of dreamers: The human imagination readily soars where human ingenuity (创造力)struggles to follow.

jushi.english: They'll not readily sacrifice their freedom of the press.
jushi.chinese: 他们不会轻易放弃自己的新闻自由。

jushi.english: Oil and water do not readily combine.
Electrical energy is so useful because it is readily converted into other kinds.
jushi.chinese: 电能是非常有用的,因为它可以很容易地转换成其他能量形式。
